title: Self-Regulated Motivation Management Strategy Development in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with online learning tools and intermediate-level language practical skills
context.additional_context: Language proficiency enhancement for in-service practitioners' work integration, emphasizing personalized learning motivation maintenance and self-regulation skills

learning_goals: Learners identify and explain at least three self-regulated motivation management strategies in simulation/VR environments
Learners establish weekly learning plans and achieve an execution rate of over 80% using VR-based tools
Learners analyze motivation change patterns based on peer feedback and learning analytics data to propose improvement strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
